title: Commonsense Inference (ATOMIC 2020)
description: Annotate commonsense inferences about events, mental states, and social interactions. Based on ATOMIC 2020 (Hwang et al., AAAI 2021). Generate if-then knowledge about causes, effects, intents, and reactions.
citation:

    volume = "35",
    number = "7",
